metadata.description: Edit photos in seconds with NanoEdit. AI-powered by nano banana ai and Gemini Flash 2.5. Achieve professional, polished results instantly—no design skills needed.

section.title: Most Popular AI Photo Editor Templates
section.description: Discover trending social media styles powered by Nano Banana AI. Create viral-worthy content with our Gemini AI photo generator templates.

retroClassicBlackSaree.title: Classic Black Saree Retro Style
retroClassicBlackSaree.description: Transform your photos into Classic Black Saree retro images with warm vintage tones.

retroRedSareeDrama.title: Red Saree Drama Retro Style
retroRedSareeDrama.description: Transform your photos into Red Saree Drama retro images with warm vintage tones.

aiProcessingError.title: AI Processing Error
aiProcessingError.message: The AI encountered an unexpected error while processing your image.
aiProcessingError.suggestion: Try using a different image or simplifying your prompt.

serviceUnavailable.title: Service Temporarily Unavailable
serviceUnavailable.message: The AI image generation service is currently experiencing issues.
serviceUnavailable.suggestion: Please wait a few moments and try again.

invalidRequest.title: Invalid Request
invalidRequest.message: There was an issue with your request format.
invalidRequest.suggestion: Please check your image format and prompt, then try again.

timeout.title: Processing Timeout
timeout.message: The generation took longer than expected and was cancelled.
timeout.suggestion: Try with a simpler prompt or smaller image size.

networkError.title: Connection Error
networkError.message: Unable to connect to the generation service.
networkError.suggestion: Please check your internet connection and try again.

general.title: Generation Error
general.message: An unexpected error occurred during generation.
general.suggestion: Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.

errors.missingImageUrl: Generation succeeded but no image URL was returned.

whatIs.title: What is NanoEdit?
whatIs.description: NanoEdit is a cutting-edge AI-powered image editing platform that transforms the way you create and edit images. Built with the latest artificial intelligence technology, NanoEdit makes professional-quality image editing accessible to everyone, regardless of their technical expertise.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that powerful image editing tools should be simple, fast, and accessible to creators worldwide. Our mission is to democratize AI-powered image editing by providing:

fast.title: Lightning-fast processing
fast.description: Get professional results in seconds, not hours

intuitive.title: Intuitive interface
intuitive.description: No complex learning curves or technical barriers

advanced.title: Advanced AI models
advanced.description: Powered by state-of-the-art Nano Banana and Gemini AI technology

flexible.title: Flexible workflows
flexible.description: Support for both text-to-image and image-to-image editing

aiGeneration.title: AI Image Generation & Editing
aiGeneration.feature1: Transform images with natural language prompts
aiGeneration.feature2: Support for multiple aspect ratios and output formats
aiGeneration.feature3: High-quality results powered by advanced AI models

userFriendly.title: User-Friendly Experience
userFriendly.feature1: Clean, modern interface designed for creators
userFriendly.feature2: Real-time progress tracking with helpful status messages

pricing.title: Flexible Pricing
pricing.feature2: No subscription lock-in - pay only for what you use
pricing.feature3: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees

technology.title: Technology Stack
technology.description: NanoEdit is built on modern, reliable technology:

aiModels.title: AI Models
aiModels.description: Nano Banana Edit and Google Gemini for superior image processing

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Next.js 15 with React and TypeScript for a responsive user experience

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Secure sign-in with Google and GitHub integration

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Scalable cloud architecture for reliable performance

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously integrate the latest AI breakthroughs to provide cutting-edge editing capabilities.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Complex technology should feel simple. We focus on intuitive design and seamless user experiences.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Every feature is crafted with attention to detail to ensure professional-grade results.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We believe powerful tools should be available to creators of all skill levels and backgrounds.

team.title: Team
team.description: NanoEdit is developed by a passionate team of engineers and designers who believe in the transformative power of AI technology. We're committed to building tools that empower creativity and make advanced image editing accessible to everyone.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or need support? We'd love to hear from you!

footer.message: Join thousands of creators who are already using NanoEdit to bring their creative visions to life. Start editing today and experience the future of AI-powered image creation.

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about our AI image editing platform, need technical support, or want to share feedback, we're here to help.

primaryContact.title: Primary Contact
primaryContact.responseTime: Our team typically responds to inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

technical.title: Technical Support
technical.issue1: Issues with image uploads or processing

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Before reaching out, you might find answers to common questions:

q1.question: Q: I can't sign in to my account
q1.answer: A: Try clearing your browser cache and cookies, or use an incognito/private window. If the issue persists, contact us with details about your browser and the error message.

q1.question: Q: How do credits work?
q1.answer: A: Credits are consumed based on the AI processing required. Text-to-image generation costs 10 credits, and additional features like custom aspect ratios cost extra credits.

q2.question: Q: Can I get a refund for unused credits?
q2.answer: A: Please contact us at drewgrant616@gmail.com to discuss refund requests on a case-by-case basis.

q1.question: Q: Why is my image taking so long to process?
q1.answer: A: AI image generation typically takes 30-60 seconds. High server demand may occasionally cause longer processing times.

q2.question: Q: What image formats are supported?
q2.answer: A: We support common formats including JPG, PNG, and WebP for uploads. Generated images are provided in PNG format.

urgent.label: Urgent issues
urgent.time: We aim to respond as quickly as possible

businessHours.title: Business Hours
businessHours.description: Our team is available to respond to emails:

socialMedia.title: Social Media
socialMedia.description: Stay updated with the latest features and announcements:
socialMedia.follow: Follow us for product updates and tips

feedbackForm.title: Feedback Form
feedbackForm.description: We're working on an integrated feedback form to make it even easier to share your thoughts and suggestions.

office.title: Office Information
office.description: NanoEdit operates as a remote-first company, allowing us to focus on building the best AI image editing experience for our users worldwide.

footer.message: Your feedback and questions help us improve our platform and better serve the creative community.

export.exportFailed:
Image export failed. Possible reasons:
• Image resource loading issues
• Browser security restrictions

Suggested solutions:
1. Refresh the page and try again
2. Use browser screenshot function:
   - Chrome: F12 → Ctrl+Shift+P → Type "screenshot"
   - Or use system screenshot tool (Win+Shift+S)
export.downloadFailed: File download failed, please check browser download settings

socialPlatforms.imageAndTextCopied:
📋 Image and text copied to clipboard!

In the {platform} sharing page:
1. Paste text content (Ctrl+V)
2. Paste image (Ctrl+V)

You can now publish your post with the image!
socialPlatforms.imageDownloaded:
📥 Image downloaded to your device!

In the {platform} sharing page:
1. Type or paste the sharing text
2. Click the image upload button and select the downloaded image

You can now publish your post with the image!
socialPlatforms.shareFailed: Share failed. Please manually copy the link: {url}
